title: Hikagaku Joushiki Keitai-kun!
original_name: 非科学常識ケータイくん！
sinopse:
It's a cute story about a girl and her cell phone that is really the latest in technology and can transform into a boy! Also, the way to upgrade it is non-other than doing intimate things such as kissing! Embarrassing moments and rivals appear!

(Source: MU)

Included one-shot:
Volume 2: Usaban!
